## CheckResourcesResponse.isAllowed() method

Check if the policy decision was that an action should be allowed for a resource.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isAllowed(check: {
        resource: ResourceSearch;
        action: string;
    }): boolean | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  check | { resource: [ResourceSearch](./core.resourcesearch.md)<!-- -->; action: string; } | the resource search criteria and action to check. |

**Returns:**

boolean \| undefined

`undefined` if the resource or action is not present in the results.
